systemLimitsDescription: Here you can see the system limits and your current usage.
systemGuideDescription: Here you can find a guide on how to use the system.

guideContainer.title: Adding and Managing Ingredients
guideContainer.description: Learn how to efficiently add, update, manage, and remove ingredients from the system.
steps: Add ingredients manually or using AI.
Edit existing ingredients with automatic recalculation.
Delete ingredients from the system.
View nutritional values of ingredients.

guideContainer.title: Creating and Editing Meals
guideContainer.description: Create nutritious meals from ingredients, manage meal information, and use AI for ingredient search.
steps: Create meals using available or new ingredients.
Update meal information and photos.
Use AI for ingredient search during meal creation.
Delete meals from the system.

guideContainer.title: Efficient Weekly Menu Planning
guideContainer.description: Create weekly menus tailored to dietary needs and restrictions.
steps: Create a new weekly menu.
Manage menu dietary needs and restrictions.
Add or remove meals from the weekly menu.
Archive and restore unused weekly menus.

guideContainer.title: Managing Weekly Plans
guideContainer.description: Efficiently assign menus and manage weekly plans and clients.
steps: Set your time zone for accurate planning.
Assign weekly menus to your plans.
Manage client assignments to the corresponding weekly menu.
Publish or unpublish weekly menus.

guideContainer.title: Adding and Managing Customers
guideContainer.description: Conveniently manage clients and change customer  settings.
steps: Add customers manually or using electronic forms.
Change customer status (active/inactive).
Adjust the number of menu choices for the customer.
Calculate recommended nutritional values for the customer.

guideContainer.title: Tracking Orders and Ingredients
guideContainer.description: Efficiently track orders and manage your ingredient inventory.
steps: View daily and weekly orders.
Combine ingredient lists for multiple days.
Enter ingredient inventory and recalculate required amounts.
Generate ingredient lists in PDF format.

guideContainer.title: Managing Subscription Limits
guideContainer.description: Understand subscription limits and efficiently manage your plan.
steps: View subscription plan limits.
Manage system alerts about limits.
Understand the data archiving process when changing plans.
